welcome.subtitle: Bitcoin is for all of us
welcome.footer:
Your wallet, your coins. 
 100% open-source & open-design. 
 Built with ❤️ in Uganda

slide1.title: Manage your bitcoin
slide1.text: Have full control with this self-custody wallet. No one else can access your bitcoin.

slide2.title: Convenient backups with cloud & manual storage
slide2.text: Your recovery phrase will be encrypted and backed up to your cloud provider, only you will be able to access it.

slide3.title: Keep your wallet and bitcoin secure
slide3.text: Enable face detection or set a pin for extra security.

pinCode.verify: Enter your PIN again to confirm
pinCode.guideTitle: Choose a 6 digit PIN you’ll remember
pinCode.guideConfirm: Enter your PIN again to confirm.
pinCode.pinCodeGuide: Your PIN is how you’ll secure your wallet.

slide1.title: Let's create your recovery phrase
slide1.text: A recovery phrase is a group of 12 random words. It is the only way to access your wallet if your phone is lost or stolen.

slide2.title: If you lose your recovery phrase, you will no longer be able to access your wallet
slide2.text: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone. Anyone who has it can access your funds.

slide3.title: Keep your recovery phrase in a safe place
slide3.text: We recommend writing these words down in order on a piece of paper and storing it somewhere safe that you will remember.

manualBackup.warning: Write it down some place safe. We will verify this on the next page. You might be tempted to, but do not save this on your phone!
manualBackup.writtenConfirmation: Yes, I have written down my recovery phrase

cancelDialog.title: You should finish
cancelDialog.body: Your Recovery Phrase is extremely important. Without this backup, you will lose all your bitcoin forever.

manualBackupQuiz.backupQuizWordCount: Select the <0>{{ordinal}}</0> word of your recovery phrase?
manualBackupQuiz.failed: The Recovery Phrase you entered is incorrect. Try again.

backupVerified.title: Back Up Verified
backupVerified.text:
Well done!. 
 Please keep your recovery phrase safe. Memorize it if you can.

protectWallet.title: Protect your wallet
protectWallet.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security to prevent anyone from accessing your wallet and bitcoin
